short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use RP1Cloud video conferencing in your Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows RP1Cloud users to schedule meetings through Google Calendar with a single click. Press the button and the meeting “Description” field will be populated with your meeting details, including how to join from all devices/endpoints.
Use RP1Cloud to host video conference calls with collaborators and clients, no matter what device they use to join, including standards-based endpoints, Microsoft Skype for Business/Teams, browsers, mobile device or phone. It is the simplest and highest quality video experience in conferencing today.
Meet, share content, record meetings and more on RP1Cloud. Featuring:
•	Full, native integration with Microsoft Skype for Business / Microsoft Teams
•	Highest quality, HD video
•	Customer portal for meeting control for user and/or administrators
•	Premium support options
